title: Chardin and the female image (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open University, BBC-TV and Paul Kafno
brief_description: Examines the paintings of Chardin in relation to the tradition of portraying the female image, and compares his work to that of contemporaries such as Fragonard, Watteau, Boucher and Greuze
description: Examines the paintings of Chardin in relation to the tradition of portraying the female image, and compares his work to that of contemporaries such as Fragonard, Watteau, Boucher and Greuze
